list.abs: 其中上宫(upper belvedere)更加恢宏，藏品也更多。这次正好赶上克里姆150周年画展，其主要作品也都陈列在上宫。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from Italian, literally fair sight', from bel 'beautiful' + vedere 'to see'

means.word_mean: 1. densely branched Eurasian plant; foliage turns purple-red in autumn
2. a gazebo sited to command a fine view
